Text: Great effort in making this torrent available but despite the clear audio, unfortunately the video is so fuzzy that I would have to rate it less than 5; an unacceptable viewing experience since the movie relies heavily of computer enhanced action scenes.

why do wankers call it a TS when its a CAM? why??

Because that is what a Telesync is, it's when you use a Camera but sync frame rate and inject sound from cable from a hearing impaired line or tape microphones right next to the speakers for more enhanced sound, (Possibly the best way to reduce other people's voice etc, Telesync can also be sitting next to the actual projector and audio put into it as well, a real Cam is someone just sitting in the audience.
